name: Psycasso
storyline:
This retro styled open world sim you’ll play as Psycasso, a struggling artist with a disturbing secret.
-By day, an upstanding member of society with a talent for creating artwork
-By night, a mass murdering psychopath with a desire for collecting body parts!
A game about Life, Death & Art.
​
summary:
Upcoming Indie Title Psycasso - A Disturbingly Creative Adventure Game
An open world retro adventure game about an artist with a dark secret.
